data.title: Locations
data.text:
Who we are

Wells Fargo is a leading global financial services company headquartered in San Francisco with hub offices in major cities across the United States. We are proud to serve one in three households and more than 10% of small businesses in the U.S. We provide a diversified set of banking, investment, and mortgage products and services, as well as consumer and commercial finance, through our four reportable operating segments: Consumer Banking and Lending, Commercial Banking, Corporate and Investment Banking, and Wealth & Investment Management.

Wells Fargo has office locations across the world to help our business customers succeed on an international scale. Outside of the U.S., we focus on providing banking services for large corporate, government and financial institution clients. We have worldwide expertise and services to help our customers improve earnings, manage risk, and develop opportunities in the global marketplace.

Our global reach offers many opportunities for you to develop a career with Wells Fargo. If you want to explore a world of opportunity, Wells Fargo wants to hear from you. Join our team and explore careers today.

Why Wells Fargo?

Since its founding in 1852 in the United States, Wells Fargo has developed a reputation for being a great place to work. We are committed to being an attractive employer for all and to advancing diversity and social inclusion.

Wells Fargo offers an inclusive environment where every team member knows and feels that they are valued, no matter their role. At Wells Fargo, we value and promote diversity and inclusion in all aspects of business and at all levels. Success comes from inviting and incorporating diverse perspectives. We value the viewpoints of our team members and encourage them to be their best. Collaboration is at the heart of our culture with everyone taking a proactive approach. Wells Fargo team members enjoy working together â€“ across lines of business and geographies.

At Wells Fargo, our opportunity-rich business, supportive managers and engaged and helpful colleagues provide the environment for you to advance your career. Our global presence makes it possible to share knowledge with co-workers around the world.

Wells Fargo offers a market-competitive total compensation package comprising salary, benefits, and incentive pay opportunities, depending upon the role.

International opportunities

Wells Fargo operates in four regions outside the U.S.: Asia Pacific; Canada; Europe, Middle East and Africa; India and Philippines. The branches and representative offices across the world cover a diverse range of businesses that includes Corporate Banking, Financial Institutions Group, Middle Market Banking, Global Payment Services, International Trade Services, Wells Fargo Securities, Wells Fargo Asset Management and Eastdil Secured.

Wells Fargo takes a long-term view with globally based relationship teams to help our customers across the world succeed financially. Our employees work in time zones and languages that best assist our customers. Wells Fargo offers many opportunities for external talent to join us and for current team members to move internally and further develop their careers. Search our current job vacancies for both experienced hire roles as well as intern and graduate opportunities.
